data.name: 山河旅探 (Murders on the Yangtze River)
data.detailed_description:
"Murders on the Yangtze River" is a horizontal axis Chinese-style whodunnit detective game developed by OMEGames Studio.


[About this Game]
Any contact must leave traces. No crime in the world is perfect, only clues await to be found.
In the year of 1900s’ an age of turbulence with collision and fusion between ancient and modern, Eastern and Western cultures.
You, the protagonist of the story, are unavoidably involved in a conspiracy . The seemingly unrelated events push you into a huge vortex of unsolved crimes and identity mystery.
Lies are disguised facts. Can you extract clues from a stack of cases and discover the final truth?

[Features]
=====Rigorous Logical Reasoning=====
During the journey, you will encounter a series of fantastic cases. According to the development of the story, you need to control the character to move between different scenes to find trails and clues
Besides that , you also need to investigate crime scenes, find evidences, inquire of witnesses and even find out the contradictions in the testimony, then infer the murderers and details of the case from the collected clues.


======Unpredictable and Bizarre Main-Line Case=======
Cases that happened in different locations seem to be unrelated, but those are actually inextricably linked to the major case.
You may be amazed at the hidden crime modus operandi and sigh for the criminal motive. Countless intricate entanglements hide behind the seemingly simple character relationships. Can you break through the mist to the final truth and complete your revenge?


======Complicated and Confusing Open-ended Branch-Line Cases ====
In addition to the main story line, there are also a series of open-ended "unsolved crime" waiting for you to solve.
You will encounter special events, trigger hidden plots, and influence story ends through your own choices. These unsolved crimes without the only answer are waiting for you to express your own opinion!


======Pleasant Tour of the Chinese-style Ink and Wash Scroll Painting=====
Along the gently unfolding scroll of ink landscape painting, we will visit the mountains and rivers of the ancient China hundreds ago.
Rafting on the Dongting Lake, sailing on the Yangtze River, viewing beautiful and pure Chinese country yard, going to the modernist metropolis—Shanghai in 1900s’, and you also can find out some mixed industrial culture—like Hanyang Iron Works.


=======Historical-Humanistic Design with Careful Textual Research=======
In terms of the overall design and painting style of the game, we have studied a large amount of museum historical materials and old photos, learning from cultural-historical experts. The whole story is based on 1900s’ history with more details like restoring the architectural style and local features of century ago. The exquisite costumes of characters and items in the game will let you experience the historical-humanistic style and features of the late Qing Dynasty and the early Republic of China .

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4590 CPU @3.3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA 950
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
